answers.answer: I do! Actually quite often. Nearly every time I begin eating I get shaky, mostly noticeable in my hands. I'm 11+5 weeks and its been happening since 8 weeks. & I'm good also, as in no diabetes. I have no Idea if this is normal. I was so overwhelmed and filled with joy at my first appointment and all of my questions went straight out the door. But I will definitely be asking my doctor this coming Thursday at my next appointment. Good luck.

question: Do you shake sometimes ? But don't have diabetes or sugar problems all good but shake bad at times . if so tell me when why you think ? & how much do you shake?
title: I need your answers
